UH-1 Huey

2.4Ghz RC Helicopter Officially Licensed by Bell Helicopter

  • 2.4Ghz Remote Control
  • Big Size (12 Inches)
  • Officially Licensed by Bell Helicopter
  • Auto-stabilizing Sensors
Suggested Price $79.99
I Want It
Description
This big size (12 inches) 2.4Ghz remote control helicopter is officially licensed by Bell Helicopter. Perfect for collectors or first time rc helicopter pilots. It's co-axial technology and auto-stabilizing sensors allow the WebRC Huey to smoothly fly up/down, turn left/right and fly forward/backward. Comes ready to fly, all batteries included.
Inspiration
The real life UH-1 Huey has been the most widely used military helicopter of all time. We designed this 3 channel remote control replica to pay tribute to the U.S. military's first turbine-powered helicopter to enter production for the United States military.

150+ ft Range

Multiplayer

AppRC Fly (iOS or Android)

Spare Parts

Officially licensed by:

The Bell UH-1 Huey is a military helicopter powered by a single, turboshaft engine, with a two-bladed main rotor and tail rotor.

The Bell UH-1 Huey was developed by Bell Helicopter to meet the United States Army's requirement for medical evacuation and utility helicopter in 1952, and first flew on 20 October 1956. The original designation "HU-1" led to the helicopter's nickname of Huey. Internal seating is made up of two pilot seats and additional seating for up to 13 passengers in the cabin.
